title: Deriv: chain rule, product rule, tanu

content.question: If tan(xy)=x, then<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the derivative of y with respect to x equals"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadMhaa8aabaWdbiaadsgacaWG4baa aiabg2da9aaa@3B37@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
